name: Alexandra Reeves
bio: Former rare books librarian at the Morgan Library. Alexandra combines her encyclopedic knowledge of literature with an eye for design honed through years of collecting first editions.

name: David Park
bio: Award-winning interior designer with features in Architectural Digest and Elle Decor. David ensures every book collection integrates seamlessly with its surroundings.

name: Priya Sharma
bio: PhD in Comparative Literature from Columbia. Priya specializes in international literature and contemporary fiction, bringing global perspectives to every collection.
